>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/user/admin/change/password"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



需要管理员权限。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"userUid":{"type":"string","description":"目标用户 UID"},"newPassword":{"type":"string"}},"required":["userUid","newPassword"],"title":"AdminChangePasswordRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"修改成功","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"message":{"type":"string"}},"title":"OkResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"未授权"},"403":{"description":"权限不足"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
